comment:
* Keeps and caches strings used to trace {@link View} traversals. *

* This is done to avoid expensive computations of them every time, which can improve performance.

variables.name: onMeasure
variables.comment: {@link Trace} tag used to mark {@link View#onMeasure(int, int)}.

variables.name: onLayout
variables.comment: {@link Trace} tag used to mark {@link View#onLayout(boolean, int, int, int, int)}.

variables.name: classSimpleName
variables.comment: Caches the view simple name to avoid re-computations.

variables.name: requestLayoutStacktracePrefix
variables.comment: Prefix for request layout stacktraces output in logs.

variables.name: onMeasureBeforeLayout
variables.comment: {@link Trace} tag used to mark {@link View#onMeasure(int, int)} happening before layout.

methods.name: private String getTraceName(String sectionName, String className, View v)

methodNames: private String getTraceName(String sectionName, String className, View v)
